title: Watashitachi, Luck Logic-bu!
alternative_title: Watashitachi Rakuroji-bu!,  私たち、らくろじ部！
description: The comedy shorts follow four girls who are members of the Luck Logic Club, whose activity is playing the Luck & Logic card game. Watashitachi, Luck Logic-bu! will air approximately one minute before each episode of the main series.
